Major_Arcs.title: Circus Spectacle and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, the public's reaction to the circus, and the initial conflict with Billings and the escalating threat from Matto Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Paul Bunyan's Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan's circus act and the public's reaction to the circus coming to town, setting the stage for the story.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a man intervening in a conflict with Billings, which quickly escalates into a dangerous situation with a pistol.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Circus Owner's Explanation and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Circus Owner, who explains the conflict with Matto Grasso and offers Paul Bunyan a job, setting up Paul's new role in the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Matto Grasso's envy and his escalating plans for revenge against Paul Bunyan, leading to arson and releasing Gigantico.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Matto Grasso's second act of revenge by releasing Gigantico, leading to a chaotic chase and further conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Arena Attacks and Guard Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Matto Grasso's continued attempts to evade capture and harm Paul Bunyan by attacking the pursuing guard within the circus arena.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Act and Job Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to a different circus act involving a large man and a small man, culminating in a job offer which is rejected by Paul Bunyan (the large man).

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to Marco Polo's adventures, starting with an encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, discovering a talking severed head, and receiving a magic dagger.

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress and Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo and sets up his adventure in Tibet, featuring a confrontation with the Ogress and the discovery of a talking severed head.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Magic Dagger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Marco Polo rescuing a tied man who gifts him a magic dagger, preparing him for further adventures.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mourning City and King's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Marco Polo's arrival at a city in mourning and his encounter with the King, who seeks his help in finding his missing daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Deceptive Woman and Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Marco Polo encountering a woman in distress who leads him to a castle that turns out to be a trap by the Ogress.

narrative_arcs.title: The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Escape from Ogre and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details another captive's escape from an Ogre using a magic knife, leading to a journey and a joyful reunion.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a story within a story, narrated by the Treasure Keeper, about a treasure, betrayal, and revenge set in a penal colony and England.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper's Tale and Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as a narrator and shifts the setting to a British penal colony where a prisoner proposes a deal for freedom.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Revelation and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner's desperate plea to the Captain, revealing the treasure of Agra and arranging an escape.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Captain's betrayal, escaping with the treasure and leaving Jordan vowing revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution in England
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's return to England, his confrontation with Captain Brooking, and the deadly resolution at Brooking's home.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning
Journey to the Attic and Betrayal
Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx as he investigates a haunted estate, confronts a vengeful ghost, and helps him find peace.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the premise of investigating a haunted estate due to 'unsavory events'.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate
Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial confrontation inside the haunted house with the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind's Forgiveness and Vincent's Peace
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves Vincent's torment through forgiveness and brotherly love from his sister Rosalind, facilitated by Dr. Styx (Cloaked Man).

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation
Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival
Request for Forgiveness and its Granting
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson and the Northwest Passage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the historical journey of Henry Hudson in search of the Northwest Passage, from the initial proposition to the tragic mutiny and his fate.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Introduction and Dutch Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson's story and the initial proposition from the Dutch East India Company for him to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: Voyage and False Hope in Hudson River
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the initial voyage, the crew's dwindling hope, and their exploration of the Hudson River as a potential passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's second voyage, getting trapped in ice, and the eventual mutiny that seals his fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Ransom
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, tasked with rescuing a kidnapped princess from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a duel and a romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Summoning and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and his summoning by the Caliph, who briefs him on the mission to rescue the kidnapped princess.

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's journey to the Tartar camp, including his stop at the unwelcoming oasis and interaction with a traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Duel Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Hassan infiltrating the Tartar camp, confronting guards, and negotiating a duel with Kurgan to decide the princess's fate.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel and Romantic Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the duel itself, Hassan's unconventional victory, Kurgan honoring his word, and a developing romance with the rescued princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent
